text:
As he continues his social media ramblings, RadarOnline.com has learned exclusively Kanye West is desperate for wife Kim Kardashian to show more support, and wants the world to see them as a united couple.

“It really bothers Kanye that Kim’s distancing herself from him lately, and he knows people are gossiping about trouble in the marriage,” a source told RadarOnline.com.

As RadarOnline.com readers know, West, 40, has been on a tweeting tirade for the past several weeks, and even admitted to undergoing liposuction and abusing painkillers.
title: Krazy Kanye Desperate For Kim’s Support As He Tweets Off The Deep End
